title: Leveled Up But Didn't Get Champion Capsule
body: I leveled up to level 46 yesterday and I got the level up animation but my Champion Capsule wasn't in my loot. Is there anything I can do to get my Capsule?

replies.body: Looks like that chest was added normally, it might have just come in a bit late. That level up capsule was already opened and gave you a Rammus and Akali champ shard. Let me know if you're not seeing those though!
Is there any way to check loot history? I'm extremely forgetful so I might have just opened it but don't remember a thing.
Not in the client no, but I did mention that the chest was opened already and it gave you a Rammus and Akali shard. Looks like those were then disenchanted for essence.
ah alright. Sorry about that, I don't even remember opening those lmao
No worries fam, happens to the best of us when we're excited to get into the next game ^_^
